overview: No More Sleep No More is a work that takes shape from the artist's research on the theme of sleep in contemporary society and the politics of the time. The viewer is invited to lie down on a chaise-longue and listen, through headphones, to the conversations between the author and some experts on the socio-political importance of sleep and wakefulness. Abstract images, produced by the artist in a hypnagogic state, flow on a large screen.
title: No More Sleep No More
